item.title: A Salute to Legends Like Kathy Bates, Jean Smart and Harrison Ford on Finally Getting Their Emmy Flowers
item.description: I’m sure we’re all doom scrolling through social media these days, and it has most certainly not been good for my mental health. (Have you read some of my recent columns or Awards HQ newsletters? Yeah
